item.field: Władysław Kowalski, Michał Bajor, Jerzy Zelnik, Jerzy Stuhr, Grażyna Szapołowska, Jerzy Nowak, Ewa Dałkowska, Piotr Machalica, Zygmunt Zintel, Henryk Bista
In 1930s Poland, a powerful psychic steers a group of strangers toward a fated convergence that ensures survival for one and annihilation for others.
Luis Brandoni, China Zorrilla, Antonio Gasalla, Julio De Grazia, Betiana Blum, Monica Villa, Juan Manuel Tenuta, Andrea Tenuta, Cecilia Rossetto, Enrique Pinti
Cora has three sons and a daughter and she´s almost 80. One day during a family reunion the big question comes up: who will be her heir?
Mandakini, Rajiv Kapoor, Divya Rana, Saeed Jaffrey, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Raza Murad, Sushma Seth, Trilok Kapoor
Abandoned by her new husband and father of her son, a mountain woman journeys to Calcutta to find him, constantly tested by social evils along the way.
Leela Naidu, Neena Gupta, Anita Kanwar, Soni Razdan, Dalip Tahil, K.K. Raina, Kunal Kapoor, Keith Stevenson, Naseeruddin Shah, Kulbhushan Kharbanda
A Goan native returns to his now-derelict, palatial childhood home, recalling his family’s interpersonal drama during the end of Portuguese rule.
Hou Hsiao, Gordon Liu, Lily Li, Jason Pai Piao, Chia-Liang Liu
Shaolin monk San Te returns to protect a fellow hero with a talent for finding trouble in this action-packed sequel to "The 36th Chamber of Shaolin."
Chia-Hui Liu, Wong Yu, Jason Pai Piao, Lung Wei Wang, Hoi-Shan Kwan, Feng Ku, San Nam Hung, Kuo Hua Chang, Feng Kuan
To avenge his master, a wine-loving young man steps up his fighting skills to defeat a powerful thief in a life-or-death match.
Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers, Dolph Lundgren, Brigitte Nielsen, Tony Burton, Michael Pataki
Rocky Balboa takes on the Cold War, coming out of retirement to battle a Soviet fighter who pulverized Rocky's friend and former rival, Apollo Creed.
